labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.expected_result: The summary appears where it would if you were zoomed out
data.short_description: user summary appears partially off screen when zoomed in on mac
data.steps_to_repro: - With two fingers double tap on the trackpad to smart zoom on osx - Click on a user to see their user summary - Double tap with two fingers again to go back to normal view
